message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I believe a starting price of $12,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value and features of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $11,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you at this price.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet your asking price. I would like to propose $10,500 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
